ComicInfo.Summary: As a confused living Ernest tries to figure our what he is the Unconscious Evil Ernie starts to put together the events, Purgatori has messed with his mind and caused him to go on this quest of self discovery., he has also been loosing control of the deadmind and new dead like the radioactive-dead don't listen to him at all. Meanwhile a gang of young men find Evil's body and speak with Smiley asking how they can help as they wish to become dead-onez. They take the unmoving Ernie to a television store and plan to revive him with the equipment there. The play loud music and put on every screen the most evil and destructive things they can find to play. It works and Ernie rises again. The reborn and living Ernest wanders the town but everywhere he goes he meets ghosts of the towns folk that knew him as a child. In the park he even see a scene from his childhood played out in front of him. Lastly he sees his young self heading into his neighbors homes with the axe he used to slaughter them and breaks down completely.
